title: Grave of Scorpius

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Grave of Scorpius, also known as the Shrine of Scorpius, is found south of West Ardougne in some crumbling ruins atop a hill. Here the Spirit of Scorpius lurks around his gravestone. There are also some ghosts, grave scorpions, and dead trees, as well as thirteen bone spawns. The Shrine has a Celtic cross on it. The Ourania Cave (and Ourania Altar) is found north of the Scorpius Shrine.

Grave of Scorpius

The Grave of Scorpius, also known as the Shrine of Scorpius, is found south of West Ardougne in some crumbling ruins atop a hill. Here the Spirit of Scorpius lurks around his gravestone. There are also some ghosts, grave scorpions, and dead trees, as well as thirteen bone spawns. The Shrine has a Celtic cross on it. The Ourania Cave (and Ourania Altar) is found north of the Scorpius Shrine.

The easiest way to access the Scorpius Shrine is via the Ourania Teleport spell. Otherwise, players can use a ring of dueling to teleport to Castle Wars and run north, or teleport to the Khazard Battlefield via the spirit tree and run west.

By talking to Scorpius, players can get an Unholy mould and have their Unholy symbols blessed. A ghostspeak amulet is not needed to talk to Scorpius, but he will only talk to players who have "seen beyond the stars" (finished the Observatory Quest).

Players can also catch Red salamanders around the area with the Hunter skill.

Players may find Solus Dellagar here if they are doing the Wanted! quest. To summon Solus you must stand in front of the Grave of Scorpius.

The '''Grave of Scorpius''', also known as the '''Shrine of Scorpius''', is found south of [[West Ardougne]] in some crumbling ruins atop a hill. Here the [[Spirit of Scorpius]] lurks around his gravestone. There are also some [[ghost]]s, [[grave scorpion]]s, and [[dead tree]]s, as well as thirteen [[bones|bone]] spawns. The Shrine has a Celtic cross on it. The [[Ourania Cave]] (and [[Ourania Altar]]) is found north of the Scorpius Shrine.

The easiest way to access the Scorpius Shrine is via the [[Ourania Teleport]] spell. Otherwise, players can use a [[ring of dueling]] to teleport to [[Castle Wars]] and run north, or teleport to the [[Battlefield|Khazard Battlefield]] via the spirit tree and run west.

By talking to Scorpius, players can get an [[Unholy mould]] and have their [[Unholy symbol]]s blessed. A [[ghostspeak amulet]] is not needed to talk to Scorpius, but he will only talk to players who have "seen beyond the stars" (finished the [[Observatory Quest]]).

Players can also catch [[Red salamander]]s around the area with the [[Hunter]] skill.

Players may find [[Solus Dellagar]] here if they are doing the [[Wanted!]] [[quest]]. To summon Solus you must stand in front of the Grave of Scorpius.
[[Category:Kandarin]]
